archimate:BusinessService.name: Customer Precedents
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use:
A range of precedents and terms needs to be tracked and applied across the different products and services to ensure compliance with regulatory and contractual terms
General comment:
Business Purpose : Maintain/track the status of customer precedents
Пример использования:
ряд прецедентов и терминов необходимо отслеживать и применять в различных продуктах и услугах для обеспечения соответствия нормативным и договорным условиям
Общее замечание:
деловая цель : Поддержка / отслеживание статуса прецедентов клиентов
Customer Precedents A range of precedents and terms can be maintained for a customer such as their marital status, military deployment, or if they are living in a declared disaster location. Precedents may impact the allowed terms and conditions for products and services and/or the manner in which products and services are processed for the customer
Detailed Summary This service domain maintains/tracks the status of customer precedents (particular conditions that may apply to the processing of multiple products and services for the customer)
Executive Summary This service domain maintains/tracks the status of customer precedents (particular conditions that may apply to the processing of multiple products and services for the customer)
Examples Of Use The bank is informed of the change of a customer precedent that triggers a review of their established product contracts and arrangements
